text: ane je loko potana palanaharathi darata hata, temana juthana jutha jannata tarapha la'i javamam avase, tyam sudhi ke jyare teni pase avi jase ane dvara kholi devamam avase ane tyanna dekharekha karanara temane kahese ke tamara upara salama che, tame prasanna raho, tame amam hammesa mate dakhala tha'i java
